message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.CR, cs.SI, cs.LG

The paper deals with the problem of detecting fake reviews in the domain of consumer electronics businesses. This involves natural language processing and machine learning techniques to classify reviews as genuine or fake. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is Information Retrieval (cs.IR), which deals with the retrieval of information from unstructured data sources such as text. Other likely sub-categories include Computational Linguistics (cs.CL), which deals with natural language processing, Cryptography and Security (cs.CR), which deals with fraud detection, Social and Information Networks (cs.SI), which deals with online social networks, and Machine Learning (cs.LG), which deals with classification algorithms.
